api_list.api_description: Get the TV schedule for a specific date and channel from Czech Television.

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: The username required to access the API.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date for which you want the schedule in the format dd.mm.yyyy.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The channel identifier (ct1, ct2, ct24, ct4, ct5, ct6, ct7).

optional_parameters.name: regiony
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 to include regional broadcasts.

optional_parameters.name: json_format
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 to retrieve data in JSON format.

api_list.api_description: Search for topics using the OpenSearch protocol on Wikimedia wikis.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of search results to return.

query: I want to check the TV schedule on 04.08.2024, and also find information on Wikipedia.
